jobDescription: DATA SCIENTISTS Home Depot USA, Inc. Has multiple openings for Data Scientists to formulate and apply mathematical modeling and other optimizing methods to develop and interpret information to assist management with decision making, policy formulation, and other designated functions and objectives. Work location: Foster City, California. Related degree, experience and/or skills required. Mail resume to: D. Loveless, Home Depot Product Authority, LLC 2455 Paces Ferry Rd Atlanta Georgia 30339
